thread.title: Elsevier Authors Drs. Eric Topol and Paul Teirstein to Participate in Book Signing at TCT 2015 Conference
thread.title_full: Elsevier Authors Drs. Eric Topol and Paul Teirstein to Participate in Book Signing at TCT 2015 Conference - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Elsevier Authors Drs. Eric Topol and Paul Teirstein to Participate in Book Signing at TCT 2015 Conference
text:
Elsevier
PHILADELPHIA , October 12,
Elsevier will also present Interventional Cardiology Clinics issue " I ntravascular Imaging: OCT and IVUS " edited by Matthew Price , MD, of Scripps Health at TCT 2015
Elsevier , a world-leading provider of scientific, technical and medical information products and services, today announced that Eric J. Topol , MD, and Paul S. Teirstein , MD, authors of the recently published seventh edition of Textbook of Interventional Cardiology , will participate in a book signing at the Transcatheter Cardiovascular Therapeutics (TCT) 2015 annual conference in San Francisco .
The book signing will take place at the Scripps Health booth (#2524) at the Moscone Center on Wednesday, October 14 , from 12:45-1:45 pm . In addition to the signing, copies of the book will be available for sale at the Elsevier booth (#2416). Bookplates will be available for those who wish to ship their purchase.
Elsevier will also showcase Interventional Cardiology Clinics issue: 'Intravascular Imaging: OCT and IVUS' edited by Matthew Price , MD, of Scripps Health at TCT 2015. Interventional Cardiology Clinics , written by key opinion leaders and published quarterly, is a comprehensive review source, offering deep coverage of interventional procedures for those in the field of cardiology .
"We are excited to celebrate our shared relationship with the esteemed staff and authors of Scripps Health on the occasion of a conference such as TCT," said Linda Belfus , Senior Vice President and Managing DirectorContent, Elsevier Clinical Solutions. "TCT is the largest and most important conference for cardiovascular medicine and we are proud to have Drs. Topol and Teirstein represent this book on such a prominent stage."
Dr. Eric Topol holds the Scripps endowed chair in innovative medicine. He is Director of the Scripps Translational Science Institute in La Jolla, CA.
Dr. Paul Teirstein , recipient of this year's Master Operator Award at TCT, is Chief of Cardiology and Director of Interventional Cardiology for Scripps Clinic, and Director of the Scripps Prebys Cardiovascular Institute for Scripps Health.
Dr. Matthew Price is Director of the Cardiac Catheterization Laboratory and Assistant Professor at the Scripps Translational Science Institute.
---
About Elsevier
Elsevier is a world-leading provider of information solutions that enhance the performance of science, health, and technology professionals, empowering them to make better decisions, deliver better care, and sometimes make groundbreaking discoveries that advance the boundaries of knowledge and human progress. Elsevier provides web-based, digital solutions - among them ScienceDirect , Scopus , Elsevier Research Intelligence and ClinicalKey - and publishes more than 2,500 journals, including The Lancet and Cell , and more than 33,000 book titles, including a number of iconic reference works. Elsevier is part of RELX Group plc , a world-leading provider of information solutions for professional customers across industries. http://www.elsevier.com
